Reviews.Title: “Fourth visit and I'll recommend this place again.”
Reviews.Author: Nan N
Reviews.Content: stayed september 2011 five nights ill recommend dont motel receive commission giving reviews dont understand bad reviews motels am picky motel busy time parking lot motel noisy night didnt bother reserve time driving holiday werent exactly wed sd basically rolled dark available ground floor front pool coffee pot broken fridge didnt arrived evening desk clerk told coffee pot fixed fridge promptly morning microwave fine warmed continental breakfast lobby orange juice apple juice nice additional lobby breakfast pan dulce bagel coffee clean linens condition clean bugs ive stayed king size bed spacious love seat coffee table entrance bed beyond closet motel isnt downtown vehicle town coronado favorite beach sd attractions easy driving range convenient entering arriving mexico southern california border crossings using i8 arizona

Reviews.Title: “i booked this thru travelocity...what a joke”
Reviews.Author: calidreamin_64
Reviews.Content: checked paid fori morning endless calls office finally answer tells travelocity havent paid needless sayi pissed office id cc tell ahold travelocity called 3 times answers saying call day email travelocity send email saying documented booking im company started booking lie travelocity including amenities star level hotel personally book travelocity days inn

HotelInfo.Name: San Diego Days Inn (Hollister)
HotelInfo.Address: 1101 Hollister Street, I-5 South Coronado Avenue, San Diego, CA 92154
